sn51.8:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four bases of psychic power.
sn51.8:4.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm … energy …
sn51.8:4.6: These are the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.8:4.7: It is because he has developed and cultivated these four bases of psychic power that the Realized One is called ‘the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha’.”
